price: 6. Diggah Yallih Aayoota yengeddeeh Nabii Mucammad ﷺ nubuwwannu dirabboyse mari, Nabiyow ato yallih Digaalak ken mesissam Kee hinnay meesiise waytam kenil inkittu usun Atu kennih luk temeetem manummaysan.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَأَنذَرۡتَهُمۡ أَمۡ لَمۡ تُنذِرۡهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna kafarū sawāon ʿalayhim a-andhartahum am lam tundhir'hum lā yu'minūna
